recurring_characters.name: Speaker/Narrator
recurring_characters.profile: Former software engineer turned artist. Childhood: conformist, quiet, 'sensible' in opposition to Harry. Adulthood: embraced creativity, recognized shared traits with Harry.
recurring_characters.key_trait: Defined self against Harry's chaos, later accepted their similarities

recurring_characters.name: Harry
recurring_characters.profile: Brilliant creative who died young. Created 'Harry Land' (elaborate fantasy world in wardrobe). Expelled from Melbourne Grammar. Boundary-pushing, volatile, inspiring.
recurring_characters.key_trait: Fearless genius who made people uncomfortable but left profound impact

recurring_characters.name: Father
recurring_characters.profile: Traditional, worried parent who chose conservative schooling to manage Harry's behavior

family_dynamic: Harry's wild creativity vs. family conformity. Brothers grew from opposition to connection before Harry's death.
